description: Sweet Spring onions baked to perfection with an easy to make authentic romesco sauce straight from our mom's kitchen in Spain.
name: Meatless Monday - Spring Onions with Romesco Sauce
recipeIngredient: About 1/4 tsp extra virgin olive oil for each spring onion

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle each spring onion with extra virgin olive oil and wrap them individually in aluminum foil
Place wrapped onions in baking sheet and bake for 30 minutes
Remove the baking sheet from the oven and carefully unwrap each onion ( They will be hot!)
Bake them again for another 15 minutes until the skin starts to become really dark.
Serve the Spring Onions hot with the romesco sauce.
Before eating the onions remove the outer layer, dip de soft spring onion in the Romesco Sauce.
ENJOY! from May I have that Recipe.
